name: Fist of Poseidon
description:
Fist of Poseidon is a 2d boat combat game where you control a highly maneuverable boat that is able to quickly shoot torpedoes to take out as many foes as possible before you meet your inevitable demise.

  • Embark into an arcade experience that is completely nautical.
  • Fight through endless amounts of enemies including.

-Machine Gunning Boats

-Ramming Speed Boats

-Bombing Warplanes

-Rapid firing Submarines

  • Chose your approach to combat by ramming through ,or shooting with your torpedoes.
  • Local high score system
  • enjoy limitless gameplay

This Game is currently in alpha.

The prototype can be found here: https://sparked99.itch.io/furzboot

Epilepsy warning: flashing occurs during this game proceed with caution.
